item.title: Ignore file in Svn
item.description: I spent a bit of time this afternoon marveling at the non intuitiveness of working out how to ignore files in Svn. Normally Iâ€™d just use Tortoise SVN as it makes it so easy for you but I really wanted to know how to do it from the shell! After a bit of Googling and conversation with a colleague I think I have it figured out to some extent.
